# TCControlLayoutAnchorCoordinateSystem.absolute

**Case**

Anchors are positioned according to the absolute edges of the sceren.

## Declaration

```swift
case absolute
```

## Anchors

- **TCControlLayoutAnchorCoordinateSystem.relative**: Anchors are positioned relative to the device’s screen size.
